#summary Getting Started with Android application

=== Build and Run, Hello World ===

 # Register yourself at mCruiseOn. Include the license.lic file to your classpath.
 # Download the client library [http://code.google.com/p/carpool-powered-by-mcruiseon/downloads/detail?name=mCruiseOnCommonLibrary.jar&can=2&q= mCruiseOnCommonLibrary.jar] and [http://code.google.com/p/carpool-powered-by-mcruiseon/downloads/detail?name=mCruiseOnCarPoolLibrary.jar&can=2&q= mCruiseOnCarPoolLibrary.jar], include it in your Build Path
 # Download [http://code.google.com/p/carpool-powered-by-mcruiseon/downloads/detail?name=HelloWorld.tar&can=2&q= HelloWorld.tar], untar it, import it into eclipse, run it in the emulator again.

Now, you are ready to hit the javadocs for the library.
